original_text: Then Elijah said to Ahab, ‘Go now and have some food to eat. Go quickly, because there is the sound of heavy rain that is coming.’
korean_text: 엘리야가 아합에게 이르되 올라가서 먹고 마시소서 큰 비 소리가 있나이다

sentences.original_text: Go now and have some food to eat
because there is the sound of heavy rain
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 큰 비가 오는 소리가 들리기 때문이다
